    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Friction forces acting on rollers</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Friktion Kräfte, die auf Rollen fungieren</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Forces de frottement agissant sur des rouleaux</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Forças da fricção que agem em rolos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Forze di attrito che si comportano sui rulli</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δυνάμεις τριβής που ενεργούν στους κυλίνδρους</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Fuerzas de la fricción que actúan en los 
rodillos</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the friction forces experienced by the rollers when used to push a box on a floor surface.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">box</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">floor</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">friction force</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">pushing</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">rollers</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">rolling</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die Friktion Kräfte, die 
durch die Rollen erfahren werden, wenn sie verwendet wird, einen 
Kasten auf einer Fußbodenoberfläche zu drücken.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre les forces de 
frottement éprouvées par les rouleaux une fois utilisée pour 
pousser un cadre sur une surface de plancher.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra as forças da fricção 
experimentadas pelos rolos quando usada empurrar uma caixa em uma 
superfície do assoalho.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra le forze di attrito 
sperimentate dai rulli una volta usata per spingere una casella su una
superficie del pavimento.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει δυνάμεις τριβής που 
βιώνονται από τους κυλίνδρους όταν χρησιμοποιούνται για να 
ωθήσει ένα κιβώτιο σε μια επιφάνεια πατωμάτων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra las fuerzas de la 
fricción experimentadas por los rodillos cuando está utilizada 
empujar un rectángulo en una superficie del suelo.</string>
          </description>
